Mount_Vernon.Caleb Hyatt House:
The Caleb Hyatt House (also known as the Cudner-Hyatt House) is a historic house located at 937 White Plains Post Road in Scarsdale, Westchester County, New York.


== Description and history ==
It consists of two adjoining structures. The original building was built between 1734 and 1754 and raised to two stories about 1836.
